UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity relationship of potent antimicrobial peptide analogs of Ixosin-B amide.
Literature.Author: Wu YS, Liao ZJ, Wang KS, Lung FD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>100µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>100µM)
